website_summaries.verdict: You'll have a good chance of getting natural results and moisturized skin from this creamy formula.
pros: Distances itself from competitors for being extremely moisturizing
Has some organic and natural ingredients
Good option for those who don't like heavy fragrance
cons: The tube is somewhat small, but the upside is that you don't need to apply a large amount

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the original FABULOUS
customer_reviews.text: This is not authentic, looks Identical until you read the back and it has several pages of things written as opposed to the original product where everything is on the actual bottle, also the original comes out white and smooth as to the one I ordered from here is brown. Anyways it’s a no for me
customer_reviews.author: Amela

customer_reviews.title: Most Natural Looking Self-Tanner
customer_reviews.text: To preface, this is not a gradual tanning lotion. You need to apply this with a mitt for an even application and stain-free hands. I absolutely LOVE this self-tanner. It is purple-undertoned which I have found to be so different from other self-tanners that are orange or green. It looks very natural. One thing I wish it did better was not to wash off as much when you shower. Still, though, over a few days of use, it definitely has a very noticeable/natural tanning effect. I recommend to all of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best self-tanner I've tried.  And I've tried a LOT of them.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tanner. Looks natural. Fades without getting all splotchy. I'm pretty fair and it makes me look tan. Stains your hands so wear gloves when applying. Rubs off on everything (sheets, clothing, etc.) but washes out of fabrics easily. Kinda pricey but a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: The color is great and looks very natural
customer_reviews.text: The color is great and looks very natural. I do apply it with a special mit for tanning lotions that I purchased separately. This allows for a very natural transition around the foot and hand area without being orange.
customer_reviews.author: courtney chamness

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: It goes on smoothly and there is no strange scent to it, unlike other tanning creams. The tan is instant and doesn't come off on my clothes. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: If you don't mind being orange it's great
customer_reviews.text: For so many influensters hyping it up I was disappointed. It turned me orange, it wasn't streaky though so I guess there's that. And it doesn't smell.
customer_reviews.author: Julie McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Great tanner!
customer_reviews.text: I have fair skin and use the medium tint. The tint appears very dark upon application but it washes off and leaves a nice color. One thing I love about this tanner is that it dries quickly. Make sure you use mitts or wash your hands periodically while applying. I put it on before bed and wash it off in the morning. The tint has washed out of my clothes and sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Krista O. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Sand-like “grit” in bottle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after it was recommended by a beauty blog I follow. This self tanner was a big let-down. It has something gritty in it, but not on purpose. It’s like the chemicals separated or broke down. So after rubbing it all over my legs I had specs of sand like “grit” all over me. Had a bad smell too, and definitely dried me out instead of moisturizing my skin. Tried shaking it up, no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was the gradual tanning creme which is white and has better overall coverage and color. This one is good, just takes getting used to,
customer_reviews.author: laBelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice color!
customer_reviews.text: Love this self tanner. I used a mitt to apply and have no streaks. Nice color and no "self tanner smell".
customer_reviews.author: mommabear

customer_reviews.title: Great self-tanner, little to no odor
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent self-tanner. I had previously used St. Tropez mousse, which did a good job but I had some gripes. It settled in my pores, had a tendency to be streaky and was a tiny bit orange on my skin, plus the odor of DHT was so strong I could smell it on my skin as long as the tan lasted. I am happy to say the Vita Liberata barely has an odor, which goes away as soon as you wash it off, and the color is gorgeous and natural. I get a nice, even tan. I'm very pleased with this product and if I had to nitpick I'd wish for a bit more moisturizing version.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Mama

customer_reviews.title: Too messy
customer_reviews.text: Awful - you need rubber gloves to put it on and it is messy, but the color/skin tone was good.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Smell is not bad I will often wear it out without washing it off and it looks and smells fine!
customer_reviews.author: Karlie

customer_reviews.title: Oompa-Loompa
customer_reviews.text: Exfoliated and applied later at night on two different occasions. Looks orange/ unnatural. I’ll be looking for a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Product was thick and orange colored. This is not typical of this product. This product s need defective
customer_reviews.author: DMB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply as long as you use a self-tanning ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply as long as you use a self-tanning mitt to apply it. No yucky smell. It's a nice color and fades naturally, not patchy like some other brands
customer_reviews.author: KStohler

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the color. Looked like a rust stain. :(
customer_reviews.author: Carrieann Collette

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the gradual toner
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it thinking it was the gradual toner they also carry and boy was I in for a treat. Stains and the color is very fake looking
customer_reviews.author: Janet Bava

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Product is awful. Stains everything and very runny. Nothing like the sample I received in the birchbox. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Was to dark. I didn't think it would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Was to dark. I didn't think it would be as dark as it was.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, and I put it on at night. Waking up all tan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Doesn't have a smell and goes on easily. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent product stays on a long time looks like a real tan fantastic
customer_reviews.author: christine craddock

customer_reviews.title: be careful in applying
customer_reviews.text: Good news no odor. Bad news you need to experiment-use very little or stains your hands and face this really unnatural cold. Would I order again? Probably not-expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: one girls opinion

customer_reviews.title: Nice glow for my face!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I use it on my face by adding a pea sized amount to my face moisturizer (which is just shea butter and olive oil) and it works great. Gives it a really gradual glow this way. A teeny bit of tanner smell but I think it’s only noticeable to me. And I definitely have to wash my hands right away afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: This tanner is PERFECT -and I dont leave reviews, until now
customer_reviews.text: I have NEVER buy the same self tanner twice, however I will be buying this one from now until they invent a perfect one in the future. This one is worth the money and the time you spend applying it (which takes about as much time as applying body lotion, and honestly just as easy) you will NOT regret this purchase and you will be hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wilson

customer_reviews.title: OMG I'M IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this in my Birch Box and was so impressed that I bought the full size. There is absolutely NO BAD SMELL! I put the lotion on after I got out of the shower and a few hours later I had this gorgeous sun kissed glow. To me this self tanner looks so natural. I used to use loving tan 2 hour express moose but this Tanner goes on like a lotion and absorbed quickly. I loved that it wasn't a moose. I can't stand the moose types. I had absolutely NO STREAKS WHAT so ever. This is now my Holy Grail tanner.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Parks

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: No obnoxious smell just an even tan. This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jaris

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color. Used a Walmart brand mitt to apply
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. Used a Walmart brand mitt to apply, I am very fair skinned and it’s supposed to be tinted but gave me a really nice glowy color that made me tan
customer_reviews.author: mikkimeow

customer_reviews.title: Has self tanner smell
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good tanner, but it most definitely has the “self tanner” smell!
customer_reviews.author: Dalinda Densmore

product_meta.title: Vita Liberata Fabulous Self Tanning Tinted Lotion, Medium, 3.38 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
A highly moisturizing medium tinted tan lotion with instant color that develops into a lasting tan over 4 - 8 hours. Contains certified organic extracts that condition and nourish skin and Odour Remove Technology for zero smell. The quick drying formula means you can tan and go in minutes, and thanks to a Moisture Locking System you can enjoy 72 hour skin hydration. Applies tinted for an instant color boost and easy application with no missed spots. Gentle and hydrating enough for dry, sensitive and mature skin.

BRAND STORY
By Vita Liberata
